name: Oh Shoot, We're Out!
description:
Instructions:

Have you ever dreamed of opening your own Bistro?

No?

Well, it doesn’t matter, because today is your chance to be the owner of

 the best Soup Bistro out there!

——————————————————

Step 1. Read the customer’s order

Step 2. Check the fridge and cabinet for ingredients

Step 3. Click on the pot to combine ingredients

——————————————————-

ps: Don’t forget to refer to the Super Secret Ingredient Book
